title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 3950/88 of 11 December 1988 allocating, for 1989, Community catch quotas in Greenland waters
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EEC) No 3950/88 of 11 December 1988 allocating, for 1989, Community catch quotas in Greenland waters
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITY
main_body: For 1989 the allocation of the Community catch quotas in Greenland waters shall be as set out in the Annex.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1989.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 December 1988.
For the CouncilThe PresidentY. POTTAKIS  (1)OJ No L 24, 27. 1. 1983, p. 1.
(2)OJ No L 302, 15. 11. 1985, p. 1.
(3)OJ No L 29, 1. 2. 1985, p. 9.
(4)OJ No L 29, 1. 2. 1985, p. 14.
(5)OJ No L 207, 29. 7. 1987, p. 1.
